title: Access Control List
description: JSON schema for a AccessControlList POJO

id.description: The id of the object to which this ACL applies

ownerType.description: The type of the object to which this ACL applies

createdBy.description: UNUSED -- maintained only for backwards compatibility with archived objects

modifiedBy.description: UNUSED -- maintained only for backwards compatibility with archived objects

modifiedOn.description: UNUSED -- maintained only for backwards compatibility with archived objects

resourceAccess.description: The list of principals who can access the data with the allowed types of access for each.
